featured.text: Which of the following titles best describes the main idea of this passage? (A) The Origin of Lullabies (B) The Functions of Lullabies (C) Threatening Lullabies (D) Sleep-Inducing Lullabies 54.

definition.zh_def: 搖籃曲，通常用來安撫嬰兒入睡的歌曲或旋律。
definition.en_def: Songs or melodies sung to soothe babies to sleep.
definition.example: She sang lullabies to her baby every night to help him fall asleep.
